contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox French commune |name = Gouvix |image = Gouvix 01.jpg |region = Basse-Normandie |department = Calvados |arrondissement = Caen |canton = Bretteville-sur-Laize |INSEE = 14309 |postal code = 14680 |mayor = Jacky Lehugeur |term = 2008–2014 |intercommunality = Le Cingal |longitude = -0.3025 |latitude = 49.0361 |elevation m = 90 |elevation min m = 56 |elevation max m = 133 |area km2 = 5.18 |population = 833 |population date = 2008 }} {{Expand French|date=December 2008|Gouvix}} '''Gouvix''' is a [[Communes of France|commune]] in the [[Calvados]] [[Departments of France|department]] in the [[Basse-Normandie]] [[Regions of France|region]] in northwestern [[France]]. ==Population== {{Historical populations |align=left| 1962|862| 1968|789| 1975|772| 1982|777| 1990|878| 1999|819| 2008|833| }} {{clear-left}} ==See also== *[[Communes of the Calvados department]] ==References== *[http://www.insee.fr/en/home/home_page.asp INSEE] {{reflist}} {{commonscat}} {{Calvados communes}} [[Category:Communes of Calvados]] {{Calvados-geo-stub}}
